option.name: textToSend
option.value: { "Request_details": { "project_name": "testapp", "userName": "ghasithalakmal@gmail.com", "version": "2.0.5", "date_time": "2015-05-05 22:21:02" }, "Technical_Spec": { "app_id": 125, "app_name": "testapp", "language": "java", "build_tool": "maven", "rest_framework": "RESTEasy", "orm_framework": "hibanate", "dbms": "mysql", "test_framework": "junit", "css_framework": "bootstrap", "js_framework": "anguler", "UI_theam": "theam1", "architecture": "template3", "server": "apache", "api_doccumentation_type": "type1", "technical_doccumentation_type": "type3", "test_report_type": "type2", "authontication_type": "Oauth2", "is_need_CRUD_operations_for_all": true, "is_need_CRUD_forms_for_all": true }, "Database_Design": { "db_name": "testdb", "tables": [ { "table_name": "student", "fileds": [ { "feild_name": "stu_id", "data_type": "int", "primary_key": true, "auto_incriment": true, "not_null": true, "unique": true }, { "feild_name": "stu_name", "data_type": "varchar(45)", "primary_key": false, "auto_incriment": false, "not_null": true, "unique": false }, { "feild_name": "stu_city", "data_type": "varchar(45)", "primary_key": false, "auto_incriment": false, "not_null": true, "unique": false }, { "feild_name": "phone_number", "data_type": "varchar(45)", "primary_key": false, "auto_incriment": false, "not_null": false, "unique": true }, { "feild_name": "address", "data_type": "varchar(45)", "primary_key": false, "auto_incriment": false, "not_null": false, "unique": false }, { "feild_name": "stu_school", "data_type": "int", "primary_key": false, "auto_incriment": false, "not_null": false, "unique": false }, { "feild_name": "stu_clz", "data_type": "int", "primary_key": false, "auto_incriment": false, "not_null": false, "unique": false } ] }, { "table_name": "school", "fileds": [ { "feild_name": "sch_id", "data_type": "int", "primary_key": true, "auto_incriment": true, "not_null": true, "unique": true }, { "feild_name": "sch_name", "data_type": "varchar(45)", "primary_key": false, "auto_incriment": false, "not_null": true, "unique": false }, { "feild_name": "sch_city", "data_type": "varchar(45)", "primary_key": false, "auto_incriment": false, "not_null": false, "unique": false } ] }, { "table_name": "class", "fileds": [ { "feild_name": "clz_id", "data_type": "int", "primary_key": true, "auto_incriment": true, "not_null": true, "unique": true }, { "feild_name": "clz_name", "data_type": "varchar(45)", "primary_key": false, "auto_incriment": false, "not_null": true, "unique": false } ] } ], "forign_keys": [ { "fk_name": "stu_sch_fk", "base_table": "student", "bt_feild_name": "stu_school", "reference_table": "school", "rt_feild_name": "sch_id", "on_delete": "CASCADE", "on_update": "CASCADE" }, { "fk_name": "stu_clz_fk", "base_table": "student", "bt_feild_name": "stu_clz", "reference_table": "class", "rt_feild_name": "clz_id", "on_delete": "CASCADE", "on_update": "CASCADE" } ] }, "QueryDesign": { "select_queries": [ { "queary_id": "s1", "query": "select * from student where stuname = ? and age > ?", "parameterTypes": [ "varchar(45)", "int(11)" ], "parameterNames": [ "stu_name", "stu_age" ] }, { "queary_id": "s2", "query": "select * from student" }, { "queary_id": "s3", "query": "select * from student" }, { "queary_id": "s4", "query": "select * from student" }, { "queary_id": "s5", "query": [ { "table_name": "student", "table_alise": "stu", "feilds": [ { "feild_name": "stuid", "output_name": "student_id" }, { "feild_name": "stuname", "output_name": "student_name" } ] }, { "table_name": "schools", "table_alise": "sch", "feilds": [ { "feild_name": "schid", "output_name": "school_id" }, { "feild_name": "schname", "output_name": "school_name" } ] } ], "where_clause": [ {} ] } ], "insert_queries": [ { "queary_id": "i1", "query": "insert into student values('a','a','a');" }, { "queary_id": "i2", "query": "insert into student values('a','a','a');" }, { "queary_id": "i3", "query": "insert into student values('a','a','a');" }, { "queary_id": "i4", "query": "insert into student values('a','a','a');" } ], "update_queries": [ { "queary_id": "u1", "query": "update student set age = 25 where stuid = 1;" }, { "queary_id": "u2", "query": "update student set age = 25 where stuid = 1;" }, { "queary_id": "u3", "query": "update student set age = 25 where stuid = 1;" } ], "delete_queries": [ { "queary_id": "d1", "query": "delete from student where stuid = 5;" } ] }, "RestAPI_Design": { "swagger": "2.0", "info": { "version": "1.0.0", "title": "Students", "description": "A sample API for a Student Management System", "license": { "name": "MIT", "url": "http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT" } }, "host": "api.student.com", "basePath": "/api", "schemes": [ "http" ], "consumes": [ "application/json" ], "produces": [ "application/json" ], "paths": { "/students": { "get": { "description": "Returns all Students from the system", "operationId": "findStudents", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "limit", "in": "query", "description": "maximum number of results to return", "required": false, "type": "integer", "format": "int32" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "Student response", "schema": { "type": "array", "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/student" } } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "post": { "description": "Creates a new student in the system.", "operationId": "addStudent", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "student", "in": "body", "description": "Student to add to the system", "required": true, "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/newStudent" } } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "student response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/student" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/students/{id}": { "get": { "description": "Returns a student based on a single ID", "operationId": "findStudentById", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of student to fetch", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "pet response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/student" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "delete": { "description": "deletes a single student based on the ID supplied", "operationId": "deleteStudent", "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of student to delete", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "204": { "description": "student deleted" }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/classes": { "get": { "description": "Returns all classes for a school from the system", "operationId": "findClassesForaSchool", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "schoolId", "in": "query", "description": "school Id of the school", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, { "name": "limit", "in": "query", "description": "maximum number of results to return", "required": false, "type": "integer", "format": "int32" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "Classes response", "schema": { "type": "array", "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/class" } } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "post": { "description": "Creates a new class in the system.", "operationId": "addClass", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "class", "in": "body", "description": "Class to add to the system", "required": true, "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/newClass" } } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "class response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/class" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/classes/{schoolId}/{id}": { "get": { "description": "Returns a class based on a school ID and class ID", "operationId": "findClassBySchoolIdandClassId", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "schoolId", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of class to fetch", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "class response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/class" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "delete": { "description": "deletes a single class based on the School ID and Class ID supplied", "operationId": "deleteClass", "parameters": [ { "name": "schoolId", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of class to delete", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "204": { "description": "class deleted" }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/schools": { "get": { "description": "Returns all Schools from the system", "operationId": "findSchools", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "limit", "in": "query", "description": "maximum number of results to return", "required": false, "type": "integer", "format": "int32" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "School response", "schema": { "type": "array", "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/school" } } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "post": { "description": "Creates a new school in the system.", "operationId": "addSchool", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "school", "in": "body", "description": "School to add to the system", "required": true, "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/newSchool" } } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "school response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/school" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/schools/{id}": { "get": { "description": "Returns a school based on a single ID", "operationId": "findSchoolById", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school to fetch", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "school response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/school" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "delete": { "description": "deletes a single school based on the ID supplied", "operationId": "deleteSchool", "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school to delete", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "204": { "description": "school deleted" }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } } }, "definitions": { "student": { "type": "object", "required": [ "id", "name" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "number": { "type": "string" }, "address": { "type": "string" }, "city": { "type": "string" }, "classId": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } } }, "newStudent": { "type": "object", "required": [ "name" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "number": { "type": "string" }, "address": { "type": "string" }, "city": { "type": "string" }, "classId": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } } }, "class": { "type": "object", "required": [ "id", "name", "schoolId" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "schoolId": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } } }, "newClass": { "type": "object", "required": [ "name", "schoolId" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "schoolId": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } } }, "school": { "type": "object", "required": [ "id", "name", "city" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "city": { "type": "string" } } }, "newSchool": { "type": "object", "required": [ "name", "city" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "city": { "type": "string" } } }, "errorModel": { "type": "object", "required": [ "code", "message" ], "properties": { "code": { "type": "integer", "format": "int32" }, "message": { "type": "string" } } } } }, "UI_Design": {}, "Reload_details": {} }

}, "QueryDesign": { "select_queries": [ { "queary_id": "s1", "query": "select * from student where stuname = ? and age > ?", "parameterTypes": [ "varchar(45)", "int(11)" ], "parameterNames": [ "stu_name", "stu_age" ] }, { "queary_id": "s2", "query": "select * from student" }, { "queary_id": "s3", "query": "select * from student" }, { "queary_id": "s4", "query": "select * from student" }, { "queary_id": "s5", "query": [ { "table_name": "student", "table_alise": "stu", "feilds": [ { "feild_name": "stuid", "output_name": "student_id" }, { "feild_name": "stuname", "output_name": "student_name" } ] }, { "table_name": "schools", "table_alise": "sch", "feilds": [ { "feild_name": "schid", "output_name": "school_id" }, { "feild_name": "schname", "output_name": "school_name" } ] } ], "where_clause": [ {} ] } ], "insert_queries": [ { "queary_id": "i1", "query": "insert into student values('a','a','a');" }, { "queary_id": "i2", "query": "insert into student values('a','a','a');" }, { "queary_id": "i3", "query": "insert into student values('a','a','a');" }, { "queary_id": "i4", "query": "insert into student values('a','a','a');" } ], "update_queries": [ { "queary_id": "u1", "query": "update student set age = 25 where stuid = 1;" }, { "queary_id": "u2", "query": "update student set age = 25 where stuid = 1;" }, { "queary_id": "u3", "query": "update student set age = 25 where stuid = 1;" } ], "delete_queries": [ { "queary_id": "d1", "query": "delete from student where stuid = 5;" } ] }, "RestAPI_Design": { "swagger": "2.0", "info": { "version": "1.0.0", "title": "Students", "description": "A sample API for a Student Management System", "license": { "name": "MIT", "url": "http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT" } }, "host": "api.student.com", "basePath": "/api", "schemes": [ "http" ], "consumes": [ "application/json" ], "produces": [ "application/json" ], "paths": { "/students": { "get": { "description": "Returns all Students from the system", "operationId": "findStudents", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "limit", "in": "query", "description": "maximum number of results to return", "required": false, "type": "integer", "format": "int32" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "Student response", "schema": { "type": "array", "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/student" } } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "post": { "description": "Creates a new student in the system.", "operationId": "addStudent", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "student", "in": "body", "description": "Student to add to the system", "required": true, "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/newStudent" } } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "student response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/student" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/students/{id}": { "get": { "description": "Returns a student based on a single ID", "operationId": "findStudentById", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of student to fetch", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "pet response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/student" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "delete": { "description": "deletes a single student based on the ID supplied", "operationId": "deleteStudent", "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of student to delete", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "204": { "description": "student deleted" }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/classes": { "get": { "description": "Returns all classes for a school from the system", "operationId": "findClassesForaSchool", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "schoolId", "in": "query", "description": "school Id of the school", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, { "name": "limit", "in": "query", "description": "maximum number of results to return", "required": false, "type": "integer", "format": "int32" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "Classes response", "schema": { "type": "array", "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/class" } } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "post": { "description": "Creates a new class in the system.", "operationId": "addClass", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "class", "in": "body", "description": "Class to add to the system", "required": true, "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/newClass" } } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "class response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/class" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/classes/{schoolId}/{id}": { "get": { "description": "Returns a class based on a school ID and class ID", "operationId": "findClassBySchoolIdandClassId", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "schoolId", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of class to fetch", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "class response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/class" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "delete": { "description": "deletes a single class based on the School ID and Class ID supplied", "operationId": "deleteClass", "parameters": [ { "name": "schoolId", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of class to delete", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "204": { "description": "class deleted" }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/schools": { "get": { "description": "Returns all Schools from the system", "operationId": "findSchools", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "limit", "in": "query", "description": "maximum number of results to return", "required": false, "type": "integer", "format": "int32" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "School response", "schema": { "type": "array", "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/school" } } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "post": { "description": "Creates a new school in the system.", "operationId": "addSchool", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "school", "in": "body", "description": "School to add to the system", "required": true, "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/newSchool" } } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "school response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/school" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/schools/{id}": { "get": { "description": "Returns a school based on a single ID", "operationId": "findSchoolById", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school to fetch", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "school response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/school" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "delete": { "description": "deletes a single school based on the ID supplied", "operationId": "deleteSchool", "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school to delete", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "204": { "description": "school deleted" }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } } }, "definitions": { "student": { "type": "object", "required": [ "id", "name" ], "properties": { "id": { "string" }, "address": { "type": "string" }, "city": { "type": "string" }, "classId": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } } }, "class": { "type": "object", "required": [ "id", "name", "schoolId" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "schoolId": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } } }, "newClass": { "type": "object", "required": [ "name", "schoolId" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "schoolId": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } } }, "school": { "type": option.name: textToSend
option.value: { "swagger": "2.0", "info": { "version": "1.0.0", "title": "Students", "description": "A sample API for a Student Management System", "license": { "name": "MIT", "url": "http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT" } }, "host": "api.student.com", "basePath": "/api", "schemes": [ "http" ], "consumes": [ "application/json" ], "produces": [ "application/json" ], "paths": { "/students": { "get": { "description": "Returns all Students from the system", "operationId": "findStudents", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "limit", "in": "query", "description": "maximum number of results to return", "required": false, "type": "integer", "format": "int32" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "Student response", "schema": { "type": "array", "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/student" } } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "post": { "description": "Creates a new student in the system.", "operationId": "addStudent", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "student", "in": "body", "description": "Student to add to the system", "required": true, "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/newStudent" } } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "student response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/student" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/students/{id}": { "get": { "description": "Returns a student based on a single ID", "operationId": "findStudentById", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of student to fetch", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "pet response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/student" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "delete": { "description": "deletes a single student based on the ID supplied", "operationId": "deleteStudent", "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of student to delete", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "204": { "description": "student deleted" }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/classes": { "get": { "description": "Returns all classes for a school from the system", "operationId": "findClassesForaSchool", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "schoolId", "in": "query", "description": "school Id of the school", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, { "name": "limit", "in": "query", "description": "maximum number of results to return", "required": false, "type": "integer", "format": "int32" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "Classes response", "schema": { "type": "array", "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/class" } } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "post": { "description": "Creates a new class in the system.", "operationId": "addClass", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "class", "in": "body", "description": "Class to add to the system", "required": true, "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/newClass" } } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "class response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/class" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/classes/{schoolId}/{id}": { "get": { "description": "Returns a class based on a school ID and class ID", "operationId": "findClassBySchoolIdandClassId", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "schoolId", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of class to fetch", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "class response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/class" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "delete": { "description": "deletes a single class based on the School ID and Class ID supplied", "operationId": "deleteClass", "parameters": [ { "name": "schoolId", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of class to delete", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "204": { "description": "class deleted" }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/schools": { "get": { "description": "Returns all Schools from the system", "operationId": "findSchools", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "limit", "in": "query", "description": "maximum number of results to return", "required": false, "type": "integer", "format": "int32" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "School response", "schema": { "type": "array", "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/school" } } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "post": { "description": "Creates a new school in the system.", "operationId": "addSchool", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "school", "in": "body", "description": "School to add to the system", "required": true, "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/newSchool" } } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "school response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/school" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } }, "/schools/{id}": { "get": { "description": "Returns a school based on a single ID", "operationId": "findSchoolById", "produces": [ "application/json" ], "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school to fetch", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "200": { "description": "school response", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/school" } }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } }, "delete": { "description": "deletes a single school based on the ID supplied", "operationId": "deleteSchool", "parameters": [ { "name": "id", "in": "path", "description": "ID of school to delete", "required": true, "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } ], "responses": { "204": { "description": "school deleted" }, "default": { "description": "unexpected error", "schema": { "$ref": "#/definitions/errorModel" } } } } } }, "definitions": { "student": { "type": "object", "required": [ "id", "name" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "number": { "type": "string" }, "address": { "type": "string" }, "city": { "type": "string" }, "classId": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } } }, "newStudent": { "type": "object", "required": [ "name" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "number": { "type": "string" }, "address": { "type": "string" }, "city": { "type": "string" }, "classId": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } } }, "class": { "type": "object", "required": [ "id", "name", "schoolId" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "schoolId": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } } }, "newClass": { "type": "object", "required": [ "name", "schoolId" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "schoolId": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" } } }, "school": { "type": "object", "required": [ "id", "name", "city" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "city": { "type": "string" } } }, "newSchool": { "type": "object", "required": [ "name", "city" ], "properties": { "id": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "name": { "type": "string" }, "city": { "type": "string" } } }, "errorModel": { "type": "object", "required": [ "code", "message" ],
